column2: Picked a toy to work for during the day. Got back to class and refused to give it to teacher. Tipped over chairs and left class. In wander in the hall. When told to go to class he began to kick and hit staff. Taken 3/6/19 8:45 AM to time out to calm.

column3: missed work and different staff came into the room. got up and walked out of the room and ran down the hall. 3/6/19 9:25 AM Made it back to class

column2: Ran from cafeteria to class. When rest of class got to the classroom he was holding the door closed. Blocking others from getting in. He was 3/6/19 11:35 AM moved to the side and became physical. Taken to time out to calm.

column3: threw materials. He ran out of class. Support called and he ran outside. Taken to timeout. Hitting his head. Held in a restraint 3/7/19 8:45 AM until he was safe.
